column3: Three licences re-assigned in 2003 to 'Other industry' from 'Electricity supply'
No returns received for private water supply licences in 2002 and 2003 led to over estimate in figures
Increased number of returns in 2004 received for fish farming licences in South Wessex Area
Reduced abstraction in 2004 at a number of power stations (hydropower)
Several licences in 2006 changed from surface water to tidal
Reduced actual abstraction in 2008 in Thames region for mineral/extractive industry and reduction in one significant licence
Reduced mechanical non-electrical power abstraction in 2010
